title: Summer Inernship
name: Summer Inernship
description:
A Map by Tstandri

My summer 07 internship road trip from Knoxville TN to Bakersfield CA and back.

properties.name: Amarillo TX
properties.description: Posted by TstandriSpent the night after a long day of driving. Over half way to California now.

properties.name: Bakersfield CA
properties.description: Posted by TstandriThird and final day of driving, we get to our apartment in Bakersfield where we would live for the next 3 months while working.

properties.name: Copperhill TN
properties.description: Posted by TstandriMy home town, this is where I met 2 of my friends that were making the road trip with me.

properties.name: Grand Canyon
properties.description: Posted by TstandriWe got to the Grand Canyon after dark, so we spend the night so we could see it at sunrise.

properties.name: Houston Tx
properties.description: Posted by TstandriThis is a presentation conference that interns have to attend after they have completed a summer project and present it to upper management. This is the last stop we made before being back at home in Copperhill.

properties.name: Memphis
properties.description: Posted by TstandriMemphis is were we finally got real food.

properties.name: Midland TX
properties.description: Posted by TstandriOccidental Denver City Field Tour. This was another work field trip, except this time I had a duty to take notes and learn as much as possible about Carbon Dioxide injection on dying fields. We have to squeeze as much oil out of the ground as possible.

properties.name: Nashville TN
properties.description: Posted by TstandriNashvilleA stopping point, we took a driving break in Nashville.

properties.name: THUMS Long Beach CA
properties.description: Posted by Tstandri  THUMS is an Occidental asset that is a series of 4 islands off the coast of Long Beach. The islands: Grissom, White, Chaffee and Freeman are named after the first astronauts that died in the line of duty. It is named THUMS after it\'s origional consortium: Texaco, Humble, Unocal, Mobil, and Shell. The 4 islands are simply oil rigs, but they have been landscaped and designed to look like resort islands. Even drilling rigs are placed inside a shell which looks like a big condo building.

properties.name: Tupman CA Elk Hills
properties.description: Posted by TstandriElk Hills is the job site owned by Occidental Petroleum Corporation.

properties.name: University of Tennessee
properties.description: Posted by TstandriSchool, the place my trip began.
